Submodules

fall.utils module

class fall.utils.Observation(x: dict, y: Optional[Union[bool, str, int]], seen_at: float, active_state_id: int, sample_weight: float = 1.0)

Bases: object

A container class for a stored observation.

__init__(x: dict, y: Optional[Union[bool, str, int]], seen_at: float, active_state_id: int, sample_weight: float = 1.0) → None
add_active_state_relevance(active_state_relevance: float, active_state_id: int) → None

Add the relevance calculated to the active state when this observation is the most recently observed observation. Pass active_state_id to confirm the correct state.

add_prediction(p: Union[bool, str, int], state_id: int) → None

Add a prediction to the observation for the state with the given state_id.

fall.utils.get_drift_detector_estimate(detector: DriftDetector) → float

Extract the mean estimate of a drift detector.

Module contents

fall is a package for handling reccuring concept drift in online machine learning tasks.
